title: It has been past over 2 month, where is the rework of Urgot and Evelynn?

embed.description: EDIT: Better view thanks to /u/FrankTheBoxMonster >Here's some better views: >[360...

body:
The regular rule of league is like one new champion and one reworked(updated) champion will be released every 2 month, now it should be the time, but there is no news or signs(just few unclearly imags and 2D models of them) about this at all, Riot, what happened? what and why it takes you so slow? 
Some one answer this for me? I really want to know.  THANK YOU~~~
Oh by the way i just wanna mention that Riot has 2 teams of champion rework now, so i guess these two completed reworked champions will be released at one time, expecting it already.(even i dun main evelynn and urgot)
Finally i just wanna say my thinking about Riot's progress of champion rework and new champion creation,you guys are doing things slowly, can you pls do it faster so i can enjoy my expected new mage champion?

replies.body:
That's not how the schedules work. For champions and for reworks, they're ready when they're ready. There's a reason Riot don't give specific dates, and that's because ultimately it's a creative process, and is therefore subject to quality controls, all sorts of roadblocks on the kit/tech/art/anims/SFX etc along with the usual developmental costs.

Also, last release was TWO champions, so ofc things are going to be a little slow after that.

tl;dr - they're ready when they're ready, not before, and not on any kind of finite schedule.

Also, very unlikely to get a comment in less than 10 minutes. There just aren't that many people on OCE boards. I think you should exercise a little patience, both for the reworks and here on boards.
